ygData.subject: A tale of woe.
ygData.msgSnippet: I sympathize with ya, Surastik... I started tinkering recently, and after investing around 3000PP I got up to 104 skill.  So I went on to aqualungs.  10
ygData.messageBody:
I sympathize with ya, Surastik...
I started tinkering recently, and after investing around 3000PP I got up to
104 skill. So I went on to aqualungs. 10 attempts produced 2 aqualungs.
No skill raises. I had a Intel of 167, Wis of 137 and bought the items with
131 charisma (best price possible for my faction). At this point I am
doubting Wisdom has much to do with successful creations. Am I haven't bad
luck here? Or is a 80% failure rate common? I can't even imagine trying a
rebreather at this rate.

I am wondering if we need to find a item that has better success rate than
aqualungs to get skill higher. But seems to be none to help with this. Is
anyone out there over 110 skill yet? If so, give us some insight on costs
and failure ratings. At this rate, I need to sell aqualungs for thousands
of PP rather than hundreds.

Zebbi D'Arcanus
(45th Wizard of E'Ci)

-----Original Message-----
From: webmaster@... [mailto:webmaster@...]
Sent: Wednesday, November 17, 1999 3:26 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] A tale of woe.


From: webmaster@...

Although this is my first post to this list, ive been reading em everyday
for the last few weeks.

I too am an aspiring tinkerer (skill 106) and I have successfully made Lungs
and Rebreathers alike.

Well tonight, after a week of work, I took my 4000pp and went to make some
lungs. Out of 10 attempts,
i succeeded on 4 of em. I then attempted to make 4 Rebreathers... Failure
on all four...

Another 4000pp gone and not ONE point of skill advancement. Int is 182, wis
is 100, lvl 50 character.

If any of you have any tips for me, let me know, im very close to just
giving the damn skill up, ive got over
13K pp invested into it and im quite frustrated.

Thanks in advance,

Surastik Shrieker
Lvl 50 Gnome Necromancer
Cazic Thule Server

P.S. Have we just given up on the Diamond dust? I for one am still looking
everywhere that i can and one
thing's for sure, Faeries DON'T drop it. I've killed about 1000 faeries,
maidens, guards, royal guards and the like. not one diamond dust drop/
